html.div: This utility view is provided to assist administrators in the search for data living within a particular index bucket. By selecting a host and index from the pulldowns, a list of all buckets (as of midnight in the current day) will be provided. A user may then select a bucket to search by clicking on the table row of the desired bucket. The user will be taken to a simple events view of all of the events contained within that bucket.

input.label: Host
input.populatingSearch: | inputlookup fb_hostname_index_cache | dedup orig_host | sort orig_host

input.label: Index
input.populatingSearch: | inputlookup fb_hostname_index_cache | search orig_host=$host$ | dedup orig_index | sort orig_index

table.title: Bucket Listing for $host$ / $index$
table.searchString: `fb_data_from_today` `_fb_summary_recs($host$, $index$)` | fields _time, startEpoch, earliestTime, endEpoch, latestTime, eventCount, sizeOnDiskMB, guId, index, state, id | `_fb_startEpoch_from_earliestTime` | `_fb_endEpoch_from_latestTime` | sort startEpoch, endEpoch | eval bid=index . "~" . id . "~" . guId | table _time, startEpoch, endEpoch, index, eventCount, sizeOnDiskMB, state, id, bid
